This facility would be changing the state of the users computer in ways the user may not fully realize (depending on the package being `use`d for the first time).  That requires care on our part and should not require trust on the part of the new user.  Nothing should be out of the user's control.
```julia> using Plots
The `Plots` package has not been installed on this machine for Julia 1.6.
It is available for download.  Would you like to install `Plots` now?  blink-blink
< clickable "yes" and clickable "no" which also work with tabbing and enter >```
